test_your_xhosa_knowledge: Vivinya ulwazi lwakho lwesiXhosa noSazi kanye nomndeni wakhe ngaphambi kokuba ugxumele ezifundweni zethu ezijabulisayo nezingabambisani! Khetha izinga lakho, phendula imibuzo embalwa, noma uvule izimpendulo ukuze uqale ukufunda manje.
test_your_xhosa_knowledge_full: Vivinya ulwazi lwakho lwesiXhosa noSazi kanye nomndeni wakhe ngaphambi kokuba ugxumele ezifundweni zethu ezijabulisayo nezingabambisani! Ku-Saz’ isiXhosa, no Sapho, simema abafundi bazo zonke izinsuku ukuba bahlolisise ubuhle bolimi lwesiXhosa kanye namasiko. Khetha izinga lakho—owuqalayo, ophakathi, noma ingcweti/isikhulumi somdabu—bese uphendula imibuzo embalwa ukuze ulinganise amakhono akho. Ungaveza izimpendulo ukuze uqale ukufunda ngokushesha.
our_site_offers: Indawo yethu inikeza indawo efudumele, ejabulisayo yokufunda ngesilulumagama, imishwana, izinombolo, isimo solimi, kanye nolwazi lwamasiko. Kusukela enjabulweni ye-Ukuxoxa Iintsomi (ukuxoxa izindaba) kuya emakhonweni olimi asebenzayo, sihlanganisa amagugu endabuko kanye nokufunda kwesimanje. Hlola isigaba sethu se-Isiko ukuze uthole izindaba zaseTranskei noma uzame i-Imisebenzi yethu ukuze wenze ukufunda kube mnandi. Masigcine isiXhosa siphila ndawonye!
